name: Trapeze
overview:
Trapeze is a full service interactive marketing agency headquartered in Toronto, Canada. Founded in 1999, Trapeze designs and executes online marketing experience across all manner of interactive channels. Client relationships inlcude Disney, CBS, Cineplex, Pizza Hut, Reebok Hockey, IKEA, Mitsubishi. Trapeze is part of the agency network MDC Partners, a publicly traded company.

Trapeze maintains deep in-house capabilities in all areas of strategy, creative and technology. Services include digital branding, multi-channel marketing, application development, data analytics, search engine marketing and optimization, social media marketing, market analysis, website usability, online community building and consumer engagement.
